ygData.subject: Re: Minotaur Horns
ygData.msgSnippet: I have about 4 of these horns, but don t have the skill to use them yet.  I keep seeing them sold for a gold or two in stores, can t resist picking a few up
ygData.messageBody:
I have about 4 of these horns, but don't have the skill to use them yet. I
keep seeing them sold for a gold or two in stores, can't resist picking a
few up (heard folks trying to sell them for platinum). When I right-click,
I am informed it can only be used by a bard and that it is magical. I'm
just wondering what the magical effect is? Anyone know?

I'm not certain if it is wind or brass. A horn, I assume, is a brass
instrument type. Of course this can be easily tested, simply by
seeing an effect while wielding it with different songs. Just buy
it from a store, find yourself, but not from someone for platinum!

Roop

-----Original Message-----
From: Webmistress <webmistress@...>
To: EQ Bards List <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, April 19, 1999 11:46 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Minotaur Horns


>From: Webmistress <webmistress@...>
>
>As I recently achieved a level that allows me to begin sharpening my
>skills on wind instruments, I will be looking to acquire a proper
>instrument shortly. I have heard that Minotaur Horns may be used for
>this purpose, and as an avid hunter of these great snorting beasts I
>think using one would be quite appropriate. I would just like to verify
>that this is indeed the case - that a Minotaur Horn IS a wind instrument
>- and humbly ask of those senior to myself.... is there a performance
>difference between such a horn and an instrument that one would buy in a
Guild?
>
>Many Thanks!
>
>
>Marianda
>Primadonna Percussionist
>
